## blockRendering.ConstantProvider.validatedBlockStyle\_() method

Get a full block style object based on the input style object. Populate any missing values.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected validatedBlockStyle_(blockStyle: {
        colourPrimary: string;
        colourSecondary?: string;
        colourTertiary?: string;
        hat?: string;
    }): BlockStyle;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  blockStyle | { colourPrimary: string; colourSecondary?: string; colourTertiary?: string; hat?: string; } | A full or partial block style object. |

<b>Returns:</b>

BlockStyle

A full block style object, with all required properties populated.
